aWLI_StateProvision.content: {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1036{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 MyriadPro-Regular;}{\f1\fnil MS Sans Serif;}{\f2\fnil\fcharset2 Symbol;}} {\colortbl ;\red0\green0\blue0;} {\*\generator Msftedit 5.41.21.2509;}\viewkind4\uc1\pard\cf1\f0\fs18 The company may pay, or reimburse the deceased covered person's next of kin or legal personal representative, funeran costs \b up to $12,500\b0 , for \b the following expenses\b0 .\par \pard{\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}{\*\pn\pnlvlblt\pnf2\pnindent0{\pntxtb\'B7}}\li720 Transport cost for the deceased, if the funeral is to be a location other than where the member died.\par {\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}If the deceased has been cremated, removal of the ashes to a location nominated by the covered person's next of kin or legal personal representative.\par {\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}Collection and preparation of the remains.\par {\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}Supply and delivery of a casket or urn.\par {\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}Shroud (if needed).\par {\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}Undertaker, funeral director.\par {\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}Hearse and driver.\par {\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}Use of the undertaker's permises.\par {\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}Floral car.\par {\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}Transport of the deceased's family to and from the funeral service.\par {\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}Fees and transport of a clergyperson.\par {\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}Two press notices.\par {\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}Memorial book.\par {\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}Floral tributes.\par {\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}Burial or cremation fees.\par {\pntext\f2\'B7\tab}Headstone or memorial plaque.\par \pard\li720\par \pard\f1\fs16\par }
aWLI_StateProvision.Title: Funeral Costs
aWLI_StateProvision.Name: Funeral Costs
